name: rockpaperscissors
description:
A tiny game of 'rock paper scissors'. 

Based on  Dan Clarke's Famicase Exibition 2017 entry:

'RPS → ROCK/PAPER/SCISSORS'.

Made for the A Game By Its Cover 2018 gamejam.

The game isn't completely finished (lacks sound and polish), but I think it's in a good state right now. I'll (hopefully) try to slowly make it better in the future.
